p.s: The novel Gun Love, written by Jennifer Clement and published in the year 2019 tells the story of Margot and her daughter Pearl.
Margot ran away from her home and her abusive father in order to protect her newborn daughter Pearl when she was still in her teenage years.
Now they live in a trailer park in the middle of nowhere in Florida, sleeping in an old Ford Mercury.

The given part of the novel takes place after Margot was shot and Pearl was taken into a foster home by the Child Protective Service, also called CPS, and gives a lot of information about the situation of Helen, a little girl Pearl meets when she arrives in her new home.
Helen is an eight yearsyear old girl that has been passed on to a lot of different homes in her life.

She can't remember her real parents and has been through very difficuiltdifficult times, that's why she seems confused and strange to the people surrounding her, especially when she talks so much that it is hard to follow her.
AllthoughAlthough she must connect some bad memories with her old homes she has a bag full of cell phones, each being connected to one of the places she had been brought to.
Taking everything into acountaccount her situation is very hard.
The fact that she had to go through a lot of changes in her life seems to be affecting her personality and life at her new home, the foster home of the CPSChild Protective Service.
